sn51.31:4.2: “taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamesaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā moggallāno bhikkhu evaṃmahiddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvo”ti?
sn51.31:5.2: “catunnaṃ kho, bhikkhave, iddhipādānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā moggallāno bhikkhu evaṃmahiddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvo.
sn51.31:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, moggallāno bhikkhu chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti—
sn51.31:6.3: iti me chando na ca atilīno bhavissati, na ca atippaggahito bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṃ saṅkhitto bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhitto bhavissati.
sn51.31:6.5: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure;
sn51.31:6.6: yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho;
sn51.31:6.7: yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā.
sn51.31:6.8: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.31:6.12: iti me vīmaṃsā na ca atilīnā bhavissati, na ca atippaggahitā bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṃ saṅkhittā bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhittā bhavissati … pe …
sn51.31:6.13: iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.31:6.14: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā moggallāno bhikkhu evaṃmahiddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvo.
sn51.31:7.1: Imesañca pana, bhikkhave, catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā moggallāno bhikkhu evaṃ anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti—
sn51.31:7.2: ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti … pe …
sn51.31:7.4: Imesañca pana, bhikkhave, catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā moggallāno bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
